all.q: Our deeds determine us, as much as we determine our deeds.
all.h:
“Our deeds determine us, as much as we determine our deeds.” —
George Eliot

all.q: Weeds are flowers too, once you get to know them.
all.h:
“Weeds are flowers too, once you get to know them.” —
A.A. Milne

all.q: To seek is to suffer. To seek nothing is bliss.
all.h:
“To seek is to suffer. To seek nothing is bliss.” —
Bodhidharma

all.q: You may think I'm small, but I have a universe inside my mind.
all.h:
“You may think I'm small, but I have a universe inside my mind.” —
Yoko Ono

all.q: When the root is strong, the fruit is sweet.
all.h:
“When the root is strong, the fruit is sweet.” —
Bob Marley

all.q: You don't have to be great to start, but you have to start to be great.
all.h:
“You don't have to be great to start, but you have to start to be great. ” —
Zig Ziglar

all.q: Arise, slay thy enemies, enjoy a prosperous kingdom.
all.h:
“Arise, slay thy enemies, enjoy a prosperous kingdom.” —
Bhagavad Gita

all.q: Freeing oneself from words is liberation.
all.h:
“Freeing oneself from words is liberation. ” —
Bodhidharma

all.q: Chop your own wood and it will warm you twice.
all.h:
“Chop your own wood and it will warm you twice. ” —
Henry Ford

all.q: Life is much more successfully looked at from a single window.
all.h:
“Life is much more successfully looked at from a single window.” —
F. Scott Fitzgerald

all.q: The things I carry are my thoughts. That's it. They are the only weight. My thoughts determine whether I am free and light or burdened.
all.h:
“The things I carry are my thoughts. That's it. They are the only weight. My thoughts determine whether I am free and light or burdened.” —
Kamal Ravikant

all.q: Things do not have meaning. We assign meaning to everything.
all.h:
“Things do not have meaning. We assign meaning to everything.” —
Tony Robbins

all.q: Why change? Everyone has his own style. When you have found it, you should stick to it.
all.h:
“Why change? Everyone has his own style. When you have found it, you should stick to it.” —
Audrey Hepburn

all.q: You can't build a reputation on what you are going to do.
all.h:
“You can't build a reputation on what you are going to do. ” —
Henry Ford

all.q: Too many of us are not living our dreams because we are living our fears.
all.h:
“Too many of us are not living our dreams because we are living our fears.” —
Les Brown

all.q: It is not enough to win a war; it is more important to organize the peace.
all.h:
“It is not enough to win a war; it is more important to organize the peace.” —
Aristotle

all.q: All life is an experiment. The more experiments you make, the better.
all.h:
“All life is an experiment. The more experiments you make, the better.” —
Ralph Waldo Emerson

all.q: They say love is the best investment; the more you give, the more you get in return.
all.h:
“They say love is the best investment; the more you give, the more you get in return.” —
Audrey Hepburn

all.q: Trusting our intuition often saves us from disaster.
all.h:
“Trusting our intuition often saves us from disaster. ” —
Anne Wilson Schaef

all.q: Even the smallest person can change the course of the future.
all.h:
“Even the smallest person can change the course of the future.” —
J.R.R. Tolkien

all.q: In the long run, the sharpest weapon of all is a kind and gentle spirit.
all.h:
“In the long run, the sharpest weapon of all is a kind and gentle spirit.” —
Anne Frank

all.q: Correct what you can. Learn from what you can't.
all.h:
“Correct what you can. Learn from what you can't.” —
Toni Morrison

all.q: Peace begins with a smile.
all.h:
“Peace begins with a smile.” —
Mother Teresa

all.q: Small men think they are small; great men never know they are great.
all.h:
“Small men think they are small; great men never know they are great. ” —
Chinese Proverb

all.q: You must be willing to do what others won't do, to have what others won't have.
all.h:
“You must be willing to do what others won't do, to have what others won't have.” —
Les Brown

all.q: Laws are like cobwebs, which may catch small flies, but let wasps and hornets break through.
all.h:
“Laws are like cobwebs, which may catch small flies, but let wasps and hornets break through.” —
Jonathan Swift

all.q: If you want to see things just as they are, then you yourself must practice just as you are.
all.h:
“If you want to see things just as they are, then you yourself must practice just as you are.” —
Dogen

all.q: What kills the creative force is not age or lack of talent, but our own spirit, our own attitude.
all.h:
“What kills the creative force is not age or lack of talent, but our own spirit, our own attitude.” —
Robert Greene

all.q: Dreams are the royal road to the unconscious.
all.h:
“Dreams are the royal road to the unconscious. ” —
Sigmund Freud

all.q: Happiness is a gift and the trick is not to expect it, but to delight in it when it comes.
all.h:
“Happiness is a gift and the trick is not to expect it, but to delight in it when it comes.” —
Charles Dickens

all.q: The soul should always stand ajar, ready to welcome the ecstatic experience.
all.h:
“The soul should always stand ajar, ready to welcome the ecstatic experience.” —
Emily Dickinson

all.q: A different result requires doing something different.
all.h:
“A different result requires doing something different.” —
Gary Keller

all.q: Growing up is losing some illusions, in order to acquire others.
all.h:
“Growing up is losing some illusions, in order to acquire others.” —
Virginia Woolf

all.q: You will not do incredible things without an incredible dream.
all.h:
“You will not do incredible things without an incredible dream.” —
John Eliot

all.q: Being In The Present Means Tuning Out Distractions And Paying Attention To What Is Important, Now.
all.h:
“Being In The Present Means Tuning Out Distractions And Paying Attention To What Is Important, Now.” —
Spencer Johnson

all.q: Selfishness and greed, individual or national, cause most of our troubles.
all.h:
“Selfishness and greed, individual or national, cause most of our troubles.” —
Harry S. Truman

all.q: Your mind will make you rich or poor, depending on the use you put to it.
all.h:
“Your mind will make you rich or poor, depending on the use you put to it.” —
Brian Tracy

all.q: Trying to define yourself is like trying to bite your own teeth.
all.h:
“Trying to define yourself is like trying to bite your own teeth.” —
Zen Proverb

all.q: Happiness is the spiritual experience of living every minute with love, grace and gratitude.
all.h:
“Happiness is the spiritual experience of living every minute with love, grace and gratitude.” —
Denis Waitley

all.q: The truly rich men are the ones who have health, loved ones and a work they love.
all.h:
“The truly rich men are the ones who have health, loved ones and a work they love.” —
Maxime Lagace

all.q: We all give up great expectations along the way.
all.h:
“We all give up great expectations along the way.” —
Carlos Ruiz Zafon

all.q: Heart is what separates the good from the great.
all.h:
“Heart is what separates the good from the great.” —
Michael Jordan

all.q: Make peace within, and there will be no one who can overcome you. And no one you will wish to overcome.
all.h:
“Make peace within, and there will be no one who can overcome you. And no one you will wish to overcome.” —
Dan Millman

all.q: Freedom lies in being bold.
all.h:
“Freedom lies in being bold.” —
Robert Frost

all.q: Death smiles at us all. All we can do is smile back.
all.h:
“Death smiles at us all. All we can do is smile back.” —
Marcus Aurelius

all.q: Never to suffer would never to have been blessed.
all.h:
“Never to suffer would never to have been blessed.” —
Edgar Allan Poe

all.q: There is no self-discovery without pain and loss.
all.h:
“There is no self-discovery without pain and loss.” —
Anita Krizzan

all.q: The score never interested me, only the game.
all.h:
“The score never interested me, only the game.” —
Mae West

all.q: Hardly anybody recognizes the most significant moments of their life at the time they happen.
all.h:
“Hardly anybody recognizes the most significant moments of their life at the time they happen.” —
W.P. Kinsella

all.q: Thinking is the hardest work there is. That is why so few people engage in it.
all.h:
“Thinking is the hardest work there is. That is why so few people engage in it.” —
Robert Kiyosaki
